content: **skill level** beginner if you need any help check out www thewoobles com 1 for tutorials or reach out to hello@thewoobles com 2 **completely new to amigurumi ** buy a chick crochet kit from my etsy shop 3 or directly from my website 4 it includes an in-depth tutorial on how to get started with crochet and comes with all the materials you need after going through the kit you ll be on your way to being able to make all the woobles patterns **materials** * 25 yds of yellow acrylic aran-weight yarn * 1 yds of orange acrylic aran-weight yarn * 2 8mm plastic safety eyes * polyfill * tapestry needle * stitch marker * 4mm crochet hook **size** 3 in 7 6 cm tall **language** english with us terminology -------------- © 2020 the woobles justine t all rights reserved pattern may not be copied or distributed in any form online or offline finished items may be sold in small quantities as long as credit for the pattern is given to the woobles 1 www thewoobles com 2 mailto hello@thewoobles com 3 https //www etsy com/listing/773354292/crochet-amigurumi-starter-kit-easter ref=listings_manager_grid 4 https //thewoobles com/chick-crochet-kit/
